name: Frank's Amazing Bread Farm
description:
We noticed that the progression is quite slow at the start if you do not buy the correct upgrades. To speed up the progression try to invest in the:
  • Better Ducks
  • Stack Size 
  • Richer Bread
How to play?

WASD - Move around 

Left mouse click - Chuck ducks (Can be held to throw ducks faster)

Game Explanation

Collect the ducks from your barn which can then be fed to the Bread in pond to earn some coins. Try to maintain the Breads hunger levels high as they will reward you more frequently if they are not hungry. Then using the coins earned buy upgrades or more Bread.

Upgrades Explanation
  1.   Increase Max Duck Stack - Lets you hold more Ducks
  2.   Move Speed - Lets you run faster
  3.  Richer Bread - Passive income from bread pays better (Get this upgrade early to really speed up the progression)
  4. Better Ducks - Makes the bread hunger bar fill up more and pays more money when eaten ( Important upgrade for speeding up the progression)
  5. Throw speed - The cool down between duck throws decreased ( Medium impact on the progression speed)
  6. ??????? - No one knows what it does but it must be 100% worth it!
